content: my easy tablet sleeve pattern has been updated to include instructions for both a small or medium sized sleeve this pattern is beginner-friendly and the overall size can be customized instructions on how to customize your sleeve as well as a size guide are provided in this pattern bonus the customization technique provided in pattern can be used for anything from cell phones to books this pattern is quick to work up so you ll have them ready in no time note printable display tags are not included with this purchase they may be purchased as part of my maker bundle or separately from my etsy jarfulofknots etsy com table sleeve dimensions size may vary based on yarn used - small = 8 tall x 6 5 wide fits e-readers or small tablets up to *8 - medium = 10 5 tall x 7 5 wide fits medium sized tablets up to *11 supplies needed - any super bulky weight #6 yarn bernat blanket is recommended - 6mm crochet hook - 25mm to 30mm button - basic embroidery skills - basic crochet skills this pattern is beginner friendly the video tutorial for this pattern is available on my youtube channel https //youtu be/yjjxggpmvi8 digital special - save 15% off the purchase 3 or more digital downloads at checkout with coupon code digital15 - save 20% off the purchase 5 or more digital downloads at checkout with coupon code digital20 note coupon code must be entered at check out not valid on previous purchase offers valid only on digital files including patterns
